full_summary:
### W0113-24CS05 Portable Atomized Evaporative Coolers

**Procurement Reference:** WS4302196836-Doc4314307224
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal - Competitive Open Bidding
**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Summary:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the supply of 4 portable atomized evaporative coolers to be used at Canadian Forces Base Borden. The procurement is conducted in accordance with the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Key Dates:**
* **Publication Date:** November 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 11, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 2, 2024

**Tender Requirements:**
Canadian Forces Base Borden requires 4 portable atomized evaporative coolers to control the climate in sheet metal working and machine shops.

**Selection Criteria:**
The lowest price will be the determining factor for this procurement.

**Procurement Details:**
* **UNSPSC Code:** 40101600 - Air circulation and parts and accessories
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Contract Awarding Authority:** Terri Stork (SPAC/PSPC)

**Contact Information:**
* **Name:** Terri Stork (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** terri.stork@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** None
* **Fax:** None

**Notice URL:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18042275?extsite=MTgwNDIyNzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that this rewritten entry does not include a detailed rationale for the tender closing date amendment nor an outline of the submission process. If you need that information, you will have to add it to the original text or create a new one to complement this rewritten one.
